nodes.bodyText: For this and many other places touched in this PR, would it make sense to use # as the flag in the format specifier and eliminate the explicit 0x in the string?   In this particular instance, "%#016" OMR_PRIx64)
Sorry for the scope creep.  But since you're changing the format specifier anyway it seems like an opportune moment to do this.
That would make the 0x prefix conditional, a change that I think belongs in a separate pull-request (if at all).
